title: ICN-based Service Function Chaining for Workflows
abstract: With spreading of network virtualization technologies in the world, each network function is processed in cooperation with others to achieve Service Function Chaining (SFC). A generalized structure of such a chain is a workﬂow, that can be more critical structure when a complex-type structured application must be processed. Thus, how each service function should be processed eﬃciently is one important issue for practical workﬂow SFC. In this paper
